original_text: Perhaps you think that they are true prophets who speak the Lord's messages. Then tell them to pray to the Lord Almighty for help. They should ask him to keep safe the valuable things that remain in Jerusalem. They should pray that the things in the Lord's temple and in the king's palace would not be taken away to Babylon.
korean_text: 만일 그들이 선지자이고 여호와의 말씀을 가지고 있다면 그들이 여호와의 성전에와 유다의 왕의 궁전에와 예루살렘에 남아 있는 기구를 바벨론으로 옮겨가지 못하도록 만군의 여호와께 구하여야 할 것이니라

sentences.original_text: Perhaps you think that they are true prophets
sentences.korean_translation: 아마도 당신은 그들이 참된 예언자라고 생각할지 모릅니다

sentences.original_text: Then tell them to pray to the Lord Almighty for help
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 그들에게 전능하신 주님께 도움을 구하기 위해 기도하라고 말하십시오

sentences.original_text: They should ask him to keep safe the valuable things
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그에게 귀중한 것들을 안전하게 지켜달라고 요청해야 합니다

sentences.original_text: They should pray that the things in the Lord's temple
would not be taken away to Babylon
